ApexPage.description: Display a list of 15 Account records whose Billing City is not null and those records which have been created earlier. The list needs to be shown in ascending order based on the date of creation of Account records. Populate the list in a tabular format on the VF Page [Columns = FieldNames of Account object & Rows = Records of Account object].
ApexPage.label: AccountDataList_BillingAddress
